entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • In Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections, pin S.C.Immutable to 5.0.0 to allow prebuilt reduction downstream #57129
  • Roslyn fails to report nullability problems in lambda expression conversions #57126
  • refactoring: invert condition for int? comparison errs #57124
  • Intellisense not suggest "return" keyword when i am typing in Console Top Level statement #57121
    17.1
  • Roslyn fails to detect nullability issues in binary expression with delegates such as addition #57120

Closed

  • Support Code Definition Window #4224
    Backlog
  • Support auto formatting C # #57051
  • 'ExtractMethodCodeRefactoringProvider' encounters error and is disabled #57079
  • Roslyn incorrectly learns from [MemberNotNullWhen] annotation on Nullable<T> properties in pattern matching when there's no true/false tests #51942
    17.1
  • File scoped namespace prevents contained using statements from being collapsible #57032

PullRequests

Created

  • Support 'ref' type arguments in delegates #57135
    Area-Compilers
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Moving WinForms Editor Factory logic to WinForms #57133
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the BranchId concept from teh workspace #57132
    Area-IDE
  • Remove constraint check in interesting scenario for dynamic constraint checking feature #57131
    Area-Compilers
  • Move stack allocations to start of the method to avoid repeated allocations in loops #57130
    Area-Compilers
  • BranchId experiments. #57128
    Area-IDE
  • Removed collapse for namespace level #57125
    Area-IDE
  • RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan optimization for stackalloc #57123
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure new files are formatted based on the right language version #57119
    Area-IDE
  • Honor suppression on tuple element in switch #57118
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.1
  • Fix import reader #57117
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57115
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Move feature check from lexer to binder. #57113
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add quick runtime checks to ensure core workspace invariants hold. #57109
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support the code definition window #56102
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57099
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Prefer params Span<T> or ReadOnlySpan<T> over params T[] in overload resolution #57127
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle potential stack overflow in regex parsing. #57105
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix analysis of MemberNotNullWhen in patterns #57083
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, Next
  • Remove cast tweak cases from https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/57061 #57080
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Added filescoped namespaces as a structure able to be collapsed #57108
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57116
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use release version of Debugger.Contracts #57114
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Log unexpected cancellation state in RemoteCallback<T> #57005
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57137
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57136
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support params Span<T> #57078
    Area-Compilers
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement for compiler analyzer execution #56844
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Error when ref is used on a parameter or return type of an UnmanagedCallersOnly method #57043
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix 'T is new()' crash #57091
    Area-Compilers
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Report a level 7 warning for lower-cased type names #56905
    Area-Compilers
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • Allow us to dispose batches asynchronously #53768
    Area-IDE
  • Go To Definition from source information in PDBs #57073
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Use 1ES build pools #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • IDECoreBenchmarks Changes #57112
    Area-IDE
  • Pass completion options explicitly throughout the implementation of completion providers #57058
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Remove #pragma suppressions from EditorFeatures.Cocoa #56974
    Area-IDE
  • Codefix for CS1591: Add ///<inheritdoc/> #57004
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
